sen.j: 延久宣旨枡（えんきゅうせんじます）は、後三条天皇が延久の荘園整理令など新立荘園整理政策の裏付けとした、1072年（延久4年）に再指定した国家公定枡のことである。単に宣旨枡ともいう。
sen.e: Enkyu senjimasu was the nationally official measure designated in 1072 by the Emperor Gosanjo and was used in implementing new manor regulation policy, including the manor regulation ordinance issued in Enkyu era.

Enkyu senjimasu, also referred to only by Senjimasu, was an official national measure that was designated in 1072 by Emperor Gosanjo. The measure was used in implementing new manor regulation policies, including a manor regulation ordinance issued during the Enkyu era.
sen.cmt: combined the following sentence into this one as it did not stand well as an independent sentence; split the later part into two sentences; fixed grammar
sen.e: An official national measure that was enacted by Emperor Gosanjo in 1072, Enkyu senjimasu (also referred to simply as Senjimasu) was used to implement new manor regulation policies, including a manor regulation ordinance issued during the Enkyu era.

sen.j: この枡は、制定後間もなく全国的に流布し、その後は14世紀初頭に至るまで、数多い私枡のなかにあって、一定の権威をもった公定枡として機能した。
sen.e: It became in use throughout the nation soon after the designation and under the situation where many private measures were used, it functioned until the beginning of 14th century as the nationally official measure with a certain degree of authority.

Soon after it was designated, Senjimasu was put into circulation throughout the nation, and until the beginning of the fourteenth century it functioned as an official measure holding constant authority within many private measures.
sen.cmt: changed "It became in use" to "put into circulation" for "流布:"; rearranged sentence and fixed grammar
sen.e: Soon after it was designated, Senjimasu was put into circulation throughout the nation, and until the beginning of the fourteenth century it functioned as an official measure holding constant authority within many private measures.

sen.j: しかし、南北朝時代 (日本)から室町時代を経て私枡がますます隆盛し、宣旨枡も公的な性格を失った。
sen.e: However, during the period of the Northern and Southern Courts and the Muromachi Period, private measures became increasingly rampant and Senjimasu also lost its public character.
During the period of Northern and Southern Courts and the Muromachi period, however, private measures became increasingly prosperous and Senjimasu also lost its public character.
sen.cmt: changed "rampant" to "prosperous"; rearranged sentence to read more naturally
sen.e: During the period of Northern and Southern Courts and the Muromachi period, however, private measures became increasingly prosperous and Senjimasu also lost its public character.
